r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n:
### Fixed
- Use -1 as uninitialized op_array_extension marker #1550
### Internal changes
- Use latest ubuntu images in CI #1543 - Use 8.1.4 in development buster images #1553 - Add randomized tests for PHP 8.1 and make buster containers arm64 ready #1551 - Remove regressions from randomized tests #1547
